metadata.title: CVE-2012-0756
metadata.description: Adobe Flash Player before 10.3.183.15 and 11.x before 11.1.102.62 on Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, and Solaris; before 11.1.111.6 on Android 2.x and 3.x; and before 11.1.115.6 on Android 4.x allows attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-0755.
